_comment: NON-EXECUTABLE EXAMPLE - This is a static reference showing how registry data might be structured after YAML-to-JSON conversion. This file is for documentation purposes only.

_metadata.note: Actual conversion logic belongs in Layer 6 repository, not Layer 0

_usage_notes.allowlist_only: Website must only display repositories explicitly listed in this JSON
_usage_notes.no_auto_discovery: Never scan GitHub API or organization to discover repositories
_usage_notes.fail_closed: If validation fails, halt build immediately - do not proceed
_usage_notes.non_interpretive: Display only the factual metadata provided - add no commentary
_usage_notes.multilingual: All three languages (en, fr, ar) are required for each repository
_usage_notes.rtl_support: Arabic (ar) requires right-to-left text direction in UI
_usage_notes.provenance: Always display registry_metadata fields on the website
_usage_notes.deprecated_terms: Reject entire registry if STOE or V12-V22 found anywhere
_usage_notes.layer_0_boundary: This JSON example belongs in Layer 0 docs; actual conversion logic belongs in Layer 6

_example_display_structure.description: Example of how the website might structure the display (non-executable)

en.title: TRIZEL Core Governance
en.description: Canonical governance and charter repository defining epistemic boundaries and structural principles

_conversion_notes.method: Use safe YAML parser, convert to JSON preserving structure
_conversion_notes.storage: Store as build artifact or commit to Layer 6 repository
_conversion_notes.update_frequency: Re-fetch and convert when registry changes
_conversion_notes.no_manual_edits: JSON must be strictly derived from YAML - no manual modifications
